my_magic_stickers_p1: This is your inactive Magic Code as a Sticker in all available colors. You can order these here online, or pick them up at an affiliate store near you.
my_magic_stickers_p2: After you receive your physical Magic Sticker and you hold it in your hand, you will be able to activate it by holding your mobile phone camera at it.
my_magic_stickers_p3: Then it will become your personal Magic Code, and it will belong to you FOREVER.
assign_heading: Activate This Magic Code to Belong to You Forever
assign_pop1: This MAGIC CODE has been assigned to you now. The Magic Link for Login has been sent to your e-mail address.
